original_query: SELECT MIN(ph.Id) FROM postHistory as ph, posts as p, users as u, badges as b WHERE u.Id = p.OwnerUserId AND p.OwnerUserId = ph.UserId AND ph.UserId = b.UserId AND ph.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-09-06 11:41:43' AS TIMESTAMP) AND ph.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-03 16:41:18' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.Score>=-1 AND p.ViewCount>=0 AND p.ViewCount<=39097 AND p.AnswerCount>=0 AND p.CommentCount>=0 AND p.CommentCount<=11 AND p.FavoriteCount<=10 AND p.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-08-13 02:18:09' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-09 10:20:27' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.Views>=0 AND u.DownVotes>=0 AND u.DownVotes<=0 AND u.UpVotes>=0 AND u.UpVotes<=37
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory WHERE CAST(postHistory.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-09-06 11:41:43' AND CAST(postHistory.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-03 16:41:18'

CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.Score >= -1 AND (CAST(posts.ViewCount AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(posts.ViewCount AS INTEGER) <= 39097 AND posts.AnswerCount >= 0) AND (CAST(posts.CommentCount AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(posts.CommentCount AS INTEGER) <= 11 AND (posts.FavoriteCount <= 10 AND (CAST(posts.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-08-13 02:18:09' AND CAST(posts.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-09 10:20:27')))
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E4 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E2.OwnerUserId=E4.UserId)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.Views >= 0 AND users.DownVotes = 0 AND (CAST(users.UpVotes AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(users.UpVotes AS INTEGER) <= 37)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E4E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2E4.OwnerUserId=E3.Id)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E4E3 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2E4E3 WHERE E1.UserId=E2E4E3.OwnerUserId)
